0.name: Sword Rain.
0.description: Altair uses the Holopsicon to launch swords at her opponent.

1.name: The Thirteenth movement of the Cosmos; Outline Origin.
1.description: The holopsicon removes all buffs and passives from the opponent, returning them to their original state.

2.name: The Fourteenth Movement of Cosmos: The Vicissitudes of Fortune

5.name: The sixysixth movement of the cosmons; Existence Change.
5.description: Channeling the power of the Holopsicon, sirius absorbs the target, dealing heavy dammage.

6.name: Heavenly Sword Smash
6.description: A solid dual swing from the mighty sword!

7.name: Heavy Bunker Hit
7.description: A heavy blow from above delivered with expert fatility.

8.name: EXCALIBUR
8.description: The King of Knights unsheathes her holy sword and unleashes the fabled noble phantasm excalibur!

10.name: Hangakuu!
10.description: A stolen curse from history, hangaku is a fierce and loyal spirit.

11.name: The Infinite Desception of Words
11.description: Uso no Uso, Sore wa Kururi to, Uragaeru~

12.name: Tactical Supply knife
12.description: A standard military grade NERV knife swing.

13.name: High impact pelett riffle
13.description: A sweep of high caliber rounds shot by the evangelion.

14.name: Roar of the Angel
14.description: The eva unleashes its true nature, releasing all of its savage might on the oponnent.

15.name: Advanced A.T Drones
15.description: Advanced A.T field carrying projectiles that launch at the Units oponnent.

16.name: A.T Compress sequence
16.description: Unit 13 Harnesses a powerful A.T field to crush its oponnent.

17.name: Spears of Longinus
17.description: Unit 13 Takes hold of the acient spears, unleashing their power.

18.name: Imperial strike
18.description: A sturdy stab from the son of rome.

19.name: Conquest
19.description: The nature of an emporer, the will to topple!

20.name: Aeustus Domus Aurea
20.description: The magnus opus of its emporoer, this golden theatre stands as a Holy sanctuary to the fine arts.

21.name: Volley of forks
21.description: Sebation launches an array of silverware at the oponnent with deadly accuracy, ouch.

22.name: Game of darkness
22.description: In a game with a demon, the outcome is inevitable.

24.name: Single sword strike
24.description: A single sword of her mighty Katana.

25.name: Sweeping sword slash
25.description: 2B flings her sword around her, mowing down anything in its path.

26.name: Pod Laser Beam
26.description: 2B's Pod launches a massive laser beam at the oponnent.

27.name: Demon claw
27.description: Claws hard as steel slash at the oponnent.

28.name: Demon Pummeling
28.description: With her Demonic strength, Nezuko lands a powerful hit!

29.name: Verocity
29.description: Nezuko unleashes her true Demon side, leveling the oponent with pure savagery.

32.name: Searing Flames of Undying Passion
32.description: Albedo releases the primal force of her desire, wreaking havoc on any unfortunate enough to fall prey.

33.name: Grasp Heart
33.description: A powerful spell that crushes the heart of weaker beings, less affective against stronger oponnents.

34.name: Touch of Underneath
34.description: A single negative energy touch extended from the wizard kings sorceries.

35.name: Ia Shub-Niggurath
35.description: A super tier magic spell that renders all weaker beings dead, using their lives as a sacrifice to an eldritch god of fertility.

36.name: Draconic Beat-Down
36.description: A scaley smack down of epic proportions!

37.name: Fist of fire
37.description: Milim harnesses the power of her incredible magical aura to shred the oponnent!

38.name: Dragon Nova!
38.description: The ultimate form of the strike magic gravity collapse, this attack rains black holes like meteors on the oponnent.

40.name: Recurring blade sweep
40.description: A rapid flurry of calculated slashes.

41.name: Finishing Neck Gash!
41.description: A finishing move if there ever was one, this slash takes out the weak spot of the enemy with frigthening precision.

42.name: inhuman Strike
42.description: A hit delievered with inhuman strength!

43.name: Hell's Rain
43.description: Fire rains from a foreboding sky, searing its target to bits

44.name: Roar, Crosier!
44.description: Lupisregina's mighty scepter rears forth to cause untold devastation.

46.name: Visor Blade
46.description: A hearty double blow from Lagaan's Visor

47.name: The Drill the will Pierce the Heavens!
47.description: A barrage of attacks whos might will pierce the heavens themselves!
